name: Just Dance 2023 Controller
description:
THIS APP IS EXCLUSIVELY COMPATIBLE WITH:
Just Dance® 2023 Edition on Nintendo Switch™, Nintendo Switch™ Lite, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation®5.
No controller? No problem! The Just Dance® 2023 Controller app scores your dance moves and allows you to navigate through the Just Dance® 2023 Edition game simply by using your smartphone. No camera or additional accessories required - just keep your smartphone in your right hand while dancing to let the app track your awesome moves! It's easy and fun to play, with support for up to 6 players simultaneously, so grab your friends and family and join the party!
Note: this app is a companion for the Just Dance® 2023 Edition console game exclusively. You will need a compatible video game console to use this app.
